root.message: The SDG_INDICATOR field for indicator 4-1-1, translated into all languages

languages.language: Indicator 4.1.1: Proportion of children and young people: (a) in grades 2/3; (b) at the end of primary; education and (c) at the end of lower secondary education achieving at least a minimum proficiency level in (i) reading and (ii) mathematics, by sex
